remarks: Closure of the Bochner integral on a simple function.  This version is specific to Banach spaces on the real numbers.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Feb-2018.)
statement:
sitgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.

sitgval.h $e |- H = ( RRHom ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) $.

sitgval.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. U. ran measures ) $.
sibfmbl.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. dom ( W sitg M ) ) $.
sitgclre.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. Ban ) $.

sitgclre $p |- ( ph -> ( ( W sitg M ) ` F ) e. B ) $.
